full_text:
Thanks again for the support everyone. If you have any interest in continuing this account (and have photoshop + photoshop experience) feel free to DM.

As always, Go Jackets. #CBJ https://t.co/d71dQK4m7I

What up everyone. Didn’t mean to scare anyone by abruptly leaving but I’m all good. I apologize about that.

I’ll have more info in the coming days about the future of this account so stay tuned for that.
BREAKING: #CBJ announce Joonas Korpisalo will miss the remainder of the season after suffering a hip injury that requires surgery.
